ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Truly he is fierce in his love of wealth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And is intractable in his love of worldly goods.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and surely he loves riches with a passionate loving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He certainly has a strong love for wealth and riches.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed he loves wealth to the extreme.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, he is violent in the love of wealth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely he is tenacious in the love of wealth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely he is passionate in his love for good things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! in the love of wealth he is violent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Surely, he is ardent in his love of wealth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily in the love of wealth he is vehement,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And indeed he is an avid lover of wealth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And violent is he in his love of wealth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily, he is violent in the love of wealth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And indeed he is ardent for the love of good (wealth, becoming greedy).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And he is fierce in his love of wealth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed he is, in love of wealth, intense.
